official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Children are America's Greatest Assets.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that children are America's greatest assets. Calls upon all U.S. citizens to honor, nurture, and love our children not only on Children's Day (the second Sunday in June) but on every day of the year.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Children are America's Greatest Assets.
